forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon welcomes a bright assurance of sunshine, bathing the iconic sights in a warm, golden light. Though temperatures are set to peak near 66, a gentle gust of wind rolls in from the west-southwest, infusing the air with refreshing coolness, hinting at the subtle shifts typical of this coastal gem. Despite the sun's presence, an ever-watchful marine layer lingers offshore, suggesting that it's a day when the bay may receive fleeting hints of fog, particularly as the sun begins its descent toward the horizon. This ethereal embrace of the ocean's mist could create enchanting views across the Golden Gate Bridge and beyond.

As the sun dips, skies may take on a softer hue, flanking the city in a cloak of partial clouds, the temperatures settling comfortably around 57 degrees as the evening calls. A light jacket would be a prudent choice for those venturing into the unfolding twilight, its warmth contrasting delightfully against the lingering coolness of the breeze. The tranquility of this summer evening invites leisurely wanderings along the waterfront or a simple stroll through the nearby parks, where the scent of salt in the air harmonizes with the last flickers of daylight. In this captured moment of serenity, the city thrives, waiting to share the stories of its streets with those willing to explore.
